properties.name: Rhythm
properties.description:
Welcome to Rhythm ‚Äî a multifaceted space designed for community, creativity, and culture.

We‚Äôre more than just a record store. Rhythm is a hybrid venue that combines a vinyl boutique, co-working space, event venue, and podcast studio ‚Äî all under one roof.

üé∂ Room One: The Heartbeat of Rhythm
By day, it‚Äôs our record store. By night (and sometimes by day), it transforms into our event space, equipped with:

A custom-built sound system (two ceiling-hung tops, two mids, and two massive subs)
A DJ booth with both turntables and CDJs
A projector for visuals, screenings, or presentations
A bar area ‚Äî while liquor is served with a special occasion permit, we have a full network of experienced bar staff ready to go
Flexible seating including couches and bean bags for laid-back gatherings
Perfect for listening sessions, parties, screenings, talks, workshops or intimate live performances.

üíª Room Two: The Work Lounge
This is our co-working and hangout space, featuring:

6 desks and seating for up to 20 people
A comfy couch for casual meetings or downtime
A small kitchen (fridge, microwave, and dry storage) A great spot for daytime productivity, workshops, team retreats, or casual creative meetups.

üéôÔ∏è Bonus: Podcast Studio
A dedicated, sound-treated podcast room ready for creators looking to record interviews, episodes, or voiceovers with a clean and professional setup.

We‚Äôre always open to collaborations, bookings, and ideas. Let us know what you need ‚Äî and we‚Äôll make sure the right elements are in place to bring your vision to life.

Let‚Äôs build something together.
Reach out anytime ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to work with you.

Distinctive Setting ‚Äì Exposed brick, wood beams, and an open-concept layout in a historic castle

Customizable ‚Äì Bring in your preferred setup and branding to match your event‚Äôs vision
Flexible Scheduling ‚Äì Available for daytime and evening events, with early booking options
Easy Access ‚Äì Street-level entrance with a caf√© and eatery next door
A Meaningful Choice ‚Äì Your booking supports local arts and community programming

Nestled in the vibrant St. Lawrence neighbourhood and just steps from the Distillery Historic District, The Jamii Hub is an ideal venue for tech-focused events, fostering creativity, collaboration, and community.
